headline: Barclays Raises Illinois Tool Works (ITW) Price Target to $244 with an Underweight Rating
summary: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE:ITW) is included among the 13 Best Consistent Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On October 27, Barclays‍ lifted it⁠s price target on Illinois Tool Works Inc.
